title: Izumi And The Dragon Book
alternative_title: イズミと竜の図鑑 ; Izumi to Ryuu no Zukan
status: イズミと竜の図鑑 ; Izumi to Ryuu no Zukan
description:
Description :
        "The Dragon Book" which thoroughly covers all dragon and shows adventurers the way to their dreams. Said book is a best-seller representing "Sword and Friends & Co." but its contents are based on nothing more than the the dubious stories of adventurers that haven't been verified, as a matter of fact it's riddled with mistakes. The head of the editorial department of Sword and Friends & Co. starts planning a complete revision of "The Dragon Book". Two of which who were selected are a rookie reporter with a child-like appearance, Izumi, and the beastman bodyguard, Alf. Pursuing the truth about dragons, the compiling journey begins.
